scripts.ios: npm run prepCLITablet && tns run ios
scripts.ios.phone: npm run prepCLIPhone && tns run ios
scripts.android: npm run prepCLITablet && tns run android
scripts.android.phone: npm run prepCLIPhone && tns run android
scripts.phone-ios-bundle: npm run prepPhone && tns prepare ios && npm run start-ios-bundle --uglify
scripts.tablet-ios-bundle: npm run prepTablet && tns prepare ios && npm run start-ios-bundle --uglify
scripts.build.phone-ios-bundle: npm run prepPhone && tns prepare ios && npm run build-ios-bundle --uglify
scripts.build.tablet-ios-bundle: npm run prepTablet && tns prepare ios && npm run build-ios-bundle --uglify
scripts.phone-android-bundle: npm run prepPhone && tns prepare android && npm run start-android-bundle --uglify
scripts.tablet-android-bundle: npm run prepTablet && tns prepare android && npm run start-android-bundle --uglify
scripts.build.phone-android-bundle: npm run prepPhone && tns prepare android && npm run build-android-bundle --uglify
scripts.build.tablet-android-bundle: npm run prepTablet && tns prepare android && npm run build-android-bundle --uglify
